message.body: I actually have giardia! Antibiotics start tomorrow!!!!
Love you so much. Are you freaked out or okay with the news?
I'm really relived actually! Antibiotics coming soon!!!
My lips are sealed re:lake. Ha
I fessed up to Laura actually. Still mortified. :) She's treating me in NYC March 1 or 2. Will you be there?
Glad shes treating you. i wont be back north til midmarch. Shd be in whitefield by starry skies
Aw. I'm sad I won't see you. Confession: I told Laura that when I told you I drank the river then you told me you ate your grandmothers ashes, and I knew then that I had found my people. xoxo
I'm hoping to make Starry Skies but am not sure yet. I would really like to be there. I've never seen that protocol. :)
Thats true. We were made to find each other
Sorry we got cut off! Let me know your travel plans to Maine and let me know when you will be in Philly. Maybe we can make dinner again. Or more accurately you can kitchen top. :)
Ha! I will. Will get that info to you asap
Also, so many break thrus with elliott omg
Tell me more about Elliott! Even just one! Breakthroughs for Elliot himself or in your relationship or both? I'm so happy for you!!
Yah!!! I LOVED your letter/dream vision by the way. It as so perfect and precise, as was your timing.
